name: The Weather Sunny Canvas
effectText:
"The Weather" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zones of this card's column and its adjacent columns gain this effect.
‚óèYou can banish this card, then target 1 monster you control (Quick Effect); Tribute that target, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "The Weather" monster from your hand or GY, but not with the same name the Tributed monster had on the field.
You can only control 1 "The Weather Sunny Canvas".
